#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define PB push_back
#define S(n)	scanf("%d",&n)
#define Sd(n)	scanf("%lf",&n)
#define P(n)	printf("%d\n",n)
#define ll long long
#define INF 1e7+5
int main()
{

	int n,m,p,c;
	cin>>n>>m>>p>>c;
	int refill[p];
	int i;
	std::map<int, int> rest;
	FOR(i,0,p)
	{
		cin>>refill[i];
		rest[refill[i]]=1;
	}
	int dis[n][n];
	memset(dis,1,sizeof(dis));
	
	FOR(i,0,n)
		dis[i][i]=0;
	FOR(i,0,m)
	{
		int a,b,w;
		cin>>a>>b>>w;
		dis[a][b]= dis[b][a]= min (dis[a][b], w);
	}
	
	int j,k;
	FOR(k,0,n)
		FOR(i,0,n)
			FOR(j,0,n)
				dis[i][j]= min (dis[i][j], dis[i][k]+dis[k][j]);
	rest[0]=rest[n-1]=1;

	
	
	std::vector<int> nn;
	FOR(i,0,n)
		if(rest[i])
			nn.PB(i);

	//memset(dist,1,sizeof(dist));
	
	FOR(i,0,n)
		FOR(j,0,n)
			if(dis[i][j]>c || (!rest[i] && !rest[j]))
				dis[i][j]=INF;
	int sz=nn.size();
	FOR(k,0,sz)
		FOR(i,0,sz)
			FOR(j,0,sz)
				dis[nn[i]][nn[j]]=min(dis[nn[i]][nn[j]],dis[nn[i]][nn[k]]+dis[nn[k]][nn[j]]);

	if(dis[0][n-1]!=INF)			
		cout<<dis[0][n-1] << endl;
	else
		cout<<-1<<"\n";

	return 0;
}
